dimension: 42 1/2 x 2 7/16 in. (107.95 x 6.19 cm) (without pompons or fringes)
title: Woman's belt
description: white; ends woven with diamond and zigzag patterns in black, pink, greens, and red; small red and green pompon balls, and loose and twisted yellow, green, black, and red threads
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
